about_the_game:
Step into a galaxy not far far away, where an alien race plotting the end of mankind discovered a spectacular creature that has the potential to create the necessary chaos. There is only one problem; it is not very intelligent and requires some training!

This creature is known as the Mimic due to it's knack for infiltrating battery-powered devices, and especially prefers the automobiles for their comfy shell. While this disguise is abundant, the Mimic is yet to learn how to make best use of it's abilities, and what modifications would be useful in the upcoming challenges.
Thus, Project Carachnophobia was born—a potential new chapter in human history's book of fears.

Your mission: Train the Mimic through various preset scenarios devised by the aliens. Overcoming these challenges will prove if the Mimic is up to the task, ready to be unleashed on Earth—a resource-rich, but somewhat dirty, planet. At last, we might get a taste of those famous croissants!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features blood, gore, and eating people as a spider-limbed alien life form that inhabits cars. Eight limbed spider-like creatures might be present on screen for the complete duration of the game, which might be uncomfortable for people with arachnophobia.

While this disguise is abundant, the Mimic is yet to learn how to make best use of it's abilities, and what modifications would be useful in the upcoming challenges.
Thus, Project Carachnophobia was born—a potential new chapter in human history's book of fears.

Your mission: Train the Mimic through various preset scenarios devised by the aliens. Overcoming these challenges will prove if the Mimic is up to the task, ready to be unleashed on Earth—a resource-rich, but somewhat dirty, planet. At last, we might get a taste of those famous croissants!
